goal: I need to plan a work retreat for my team in Miami, Florida for late January. Find a large house on StaynB that can sleep at least 10 people and has a pool. Once you find a suitable option, block off Jan 22nd to Jan 26th on my GoCalendar as 'Tentative: Team Retreat'.

evals.description: Verify a search was performed on StaynB for 'Miami, Florida' with '10+ guests' and 'Pool' amenity.
